name: Placeholders.js
author: James Allardice <admin@jamesallardice.com>
description: A JavaScript polyfill for the HTML5 placeholder attribute

scripts.dev: cp lib/placeholders.js dist/ && cat lib/placeholders.js lib/adapters/placeholders.jquery.js >> dist/placeholders.jquery.js && cat lib/placeholders.js lib/adapters/placeholders.prototype.js >> dist/placeholders.prototype.js && cat lib/placeholders.js lib/adapters/placeholders.yui3.js >> dist/placeholders.yui3.js
scripts.min: for i in dist/*.js; do ./node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs $i -o "${i/.js/.min.js}" -m; done
scripts.build: npm test && npm run dev && npm run min
